review: It does everything as advertised and I would buy it again. There are some issues. The normal volume setting on my receiver is 25 but I have to crank it up to around 55 when watching though the Apple TV.  Among the "channel" options is HBO Go, but not Showtime or Cinemax.  Hopefully, more channels will be added.  The content available through the premium network's online option is much broader than what is available through their "on demand" cable system.
author: Jeff Evans

review: Doesn't play amazon prime video, only sound. Works that way with other apps and games. But will mirror most videos and pictures and has apps of its own. Netflix, Hulu, hbo, to name a few. The amazon prime was a real disappointment for me because that's the reason a purchased it but I've grown to love it. It's definitely worth the price.

review: already own a first gen AppleTV and was game to try something else, so based on reading I did online and reviews, I bought a Roku 3 but was very disappointed by it, because it kept freezing during setup and I never even got to the point of using it.
